## Halifax Class Spare Items - Mattresses
### Tender Reference Number
cb-623-93214953
### Solicitation Number
W8482-242523/B

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**

The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide mattresses for the Halifax Class ships.

**Delivery Locations**

The delivery locations for the mattresses are as follows:

* CFB Halifax
* CFB Esquimalt

**Line Items**

The following line items require suppliers to provide mattresses with specified part numbers:

| Line Item | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Delivery Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 001 | Mattresses, Bed | 600 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 002 | Mattresses, Bed | 200 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 003 | Mattresses, Bed | 150 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 004 | Mattresses, Bed | 50 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |

**Supplier Requirements**

* Bidders must provide a brand name and model number or part number, and National Canadian Commercial Item Identification Number (NCAGE), for any equivalent or substitute product proposed.
* Suppliers must quote prices in Canadian dollars only. Foreign currency quotes will not be accepted.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Notice Type and Procurement Method**

* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Competitive - Open bidding

**Contracting Entity**

* National Defence
* 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K2

**Contact Information**

* Christopher Cauchi, christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca
* (555) 555-5555

**Tender Submission Details**

* Tenders must be submitted electronically to the Canada Buys website.
* Tender submission deadline: 2024-12-03T14:00:00.
* The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.
